BookFile.Header:
\section{The Second Donation}
A second collection of 57 books was sent to Jim Fowler on 2 November 2021 from Nat Smith, nephew? of Harlan. These books were from HJS's library and we held by Joan Smith for the sentimental value after his death in 1991.

Entry.Title: Observatories in Earth Orbit and Beyond

Comments.Comment: This books is part of the series Astrophysics and Space Science Library, Volume 166. Contains the article \bt{Lunar-Based Astronomy}, authored by Harlan J. Smith.

Entry.Title: Astrophysics: A Topical Symposium; Commemorating the Fiftieth anniversary of the Yerkes Observatory and half century of progress in Astrophysics

Comments.Comment: There is a book stamp of Harlan J. Smith is on the half-title page.
An ownership signature of Harlan J. Smith is found in upper-right corner of the free front endpaper.
